{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04271v1", "title": "Order reduction of $Λ$-marked monomial ideals and weak resolutions", "summary": "Borger's theory of $\Lambda$-spaces imbues algebraic spaces, which include
schemes, with an additional structure defined by an extension of the Witt
vector functor. Motivated by $\mathbb{F}_1$-geometry, we prove the existence of
a weak resolution of singularities in the category of $\Lambda$-schemes. Our
arguments are based on standard arguments in characteristic $0$ using the order
reduction of an ideal marked with $\Lambda$-equivariant data. This paper is
based on work from the author's PhD thesis.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG", "published": "2025-05-07T09:20:21Z"}
